item.description:
Our program for January will be the latest in a series of short biographies of notable humanists by HAC vice-president Doug Peary. This time the subject will be paleontologist, evolutionary biologist, popular science writer, and baseball fan, Stephen Jay Gould.

We'll start with coffee and conversation at 7:30 PM. The main program will follow brief announcements at 8:00 PM.

(It is not necessary to RSVP for this event; I'm listing it as a meetup so that you can get e-mail reminders from meetup.com)
item.name: Stephen Jay Gould, Humanist Hero
